
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VNtscTiming.cpp
          VNtscTiming.h
          VNtscTiming__Syms.cpp
          VNtscTiming__Syms.h
          VNtscTiming__Trace.cpp
          VNtscTiming__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS NtscTiming.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/NtscTiming.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VNtscTiming STATIC
    VNtscTiming.cpp
    VNtscTiming__Syms.cpp
    VNtscTiming__Trace.cpp
    VNtscTiming__Trace__Slow.cpp
    NtscTiming.v
)

target_compile_options(VNtscTiming PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VNtscTiming PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VNtscTiming verilated)
